laboratory_examinations.procedure_name: Illumigene DNA amplification assay for C. difficile
laboratory_examinations.findings: Negative for toxigenic C. difficile. (Reference Range-Negative)

Three small high T2 signal lesions consistent with simple cysts, largest measures 15 mm; no suspicious liver lesions or abnormal enhancement; sludge with probable tiny calculi within the gallbladder; gallbladder wall thickened and edematous.
